group_1.textLeft: Phew...
I'm starting to improve at using my "Target@Redirection" power, as well.

group_1.textRight: It looks super hard, casting magic power on a@different target than the one you attacked.
Just as expected of you, Yuna-san!

group_1.textLeft: I couldn't have done it without all those times@Senpai practiced it with me...
...When I think about it, Hikaru,
it's also thanks to you for introducing me to her,@isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Glad to be of service to you, Yuna-san!

group_1.textLeft: ...Speaking of which, wasn't it also on an afternoon@like this
when I first learned that you were also a@Magical Girl...?

group_1.textRight: True, that...
[surround:1021A03][chara:6103:effect_7001_attack02]Yaah!
(I wanted to go home early, because I still had@Student Council work to do...)
(...I also have to take care of that matter by@tomorrow...)

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]ジャギギ☆●△▼◇ー!!!!

group_1.textRight: Dammit...!
Hikaru...!?

group_1.textCenter: [surround:1022A02][chara:6103:effect_7001_attack02]Don't you dare lay a hand on Hikaru's Yuna-san!

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru... You're—?

group_1.textRight: Sorry for being late...!
...Ah, more like, I was so surprised!
I was thinking you looked like Yuna-san from@a distance,
but it was actually you!
Anyway, glad you're okay!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for saving me...
Still, this is rather shocking...
I had no idea that you were a Magical Girl too,@Hikaru...

group_1.textRight: Umm... Well...
It's not that I kept it a secret or anything...
Actually, when I became a Magical Girl,
the wish I made had something to do with you...
How do I put it... I missed the right time to tell@you about that.

group_1.textLeft: I had something to do with your wish...?

group_1.textRight: That's a long story, we'll talk about it another@time...!

group_1.textLeft: Alright...

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, Yuna-san.
You're a solo Magical Girl, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: ...I am.

group_1.textRight: If you want, why don't you join the team I'm on?
We've got a veteran Magical Girl senpai here.
I'm sure she'll be able to teach you lots.
And also...
In Futatsugi, there's a berserker who subdues@all other Magical Girls around her by force.
That girl is known as Juri Ooba of Ryuugasaki...
Thanks to Senpai, things seem to be better than@before.
But solo Magical Girls and those who are weak@are still easily beaten up...
And many Magical Girls can't perform their duties@due to a fear of retaliation from Juri...
As Yuna-san, you should be fine, but...
It's still, I dunno, safer to be part of a team.

group_1.textLeft: ...If that's so, could you perhaps introduce me@to that team...?

group_1.textRight: Gladly!

group_1.textLeft: Why, Hikaru, you're back.
...Ah, who's this?

group_1.textRight: Senpai, meet Yuna-san!

group_1.textLeft: Yuna-san, this is the veteran Magical Girl senpai@I was talking about.

group_1.textRight: It's my pleasure to meet you. I'm Yuna Kureha...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's you...

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: I've heard a whole lot about you from Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: Ahh! That's supposed to be a secret!

group_1.textLeft: My, is that so.
Well...if you're here, that means you want to be@on the team?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Very well, then.

group_1.textRight: This easily...? Are there any tests, or...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Hikaru was so eager to bring you home.

group_1.textRight: Hey, Hikaru's not a dog!

group_1.textLeft: Hehehe, I apologize. Yuna-san...is it?
I just have one question for you about joining@the team.
You know, when you're on a team...
Aside from defeating Witches together with us all,
you will also need to communicate with all sorts@of Magical Girls from other teams.
So, Yuna...
What exactly do you think it takes to get them@to listen to you?

group_1.textRight: Well...
...It's about facing them with an earnest attitude,
and showing sincerity with your actions... I believe?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Excellent, I like how you think!
Okay, once again... Welcome to the team, Yuna.@I look forward to working with you.

group_1.textRight: ...Y-yes!
